title: How To Create a Vertical Menu

content.text: Learn how to create a vertical menu with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a vertical menu with CSS.

content.text: How To Create a Vertical Button Group

content.code: Home   Link 1   Link 2   Link 3   Link 4
content.code_html:
<div class="vertical-menu">
  <a href="#" class="active">Home</a>
  <a href="#">Link 1</a>
  <a href="#">Link 2</a>
  <a href="#">Link 3</a>
  <a href="#">Link 4</a>
</div>

content.code_html:
.vertical-menu {
  width: 200px; /* Set a width if you like */
}

.vertical-menu a {
  background-color: #eee; /* Grey background color */
  color: black; /* Black text color */
  display: block; /* Make the links appear below each other */
  padding: 12px; /* Add some padding */
  text-decoration: none; /* Remove underline from links */
}

.vertical-menu a:hover {
  background-color: #ccc; /* Dark grey background on mouse-over */
}

.vertical-menu a.active {
  background-color: #04AA6D; /* Add a green color to the "active/current" link */
  color: white;
}

content.text: Set a specific height and add the overflow property if you want a vertical scroll menu:
content.html: Set a specific height and add the overflow property if you want a vertical scroll menu:

content.code_html:
.vertical-menu {
  width: 200px;
  height: 150px;
  overflow-y: auto;
}

content.text: Tip: Check out our How To - Side Navigation tutorial to learn how to create a fixed, full-height side navigation.
content.html: Tip: Check out our How To - Side Navigation tutorial to learn how to create a fixed, full-height side navigation.
